verses.verse: בֵּאדַ֛יִן <S%H116><s%> Then דָּרְיָ֥וֶשׁ <S%H1868><s%> Darius מַלְכָּ֖א <S%H4430><s%> the king שָׂ֣ם <S%H7761><s%> made טְעֵ֑ם <S%H2942><s%> a decree וּבַקַּ֣רוּ ׀ <S%H1240><s%> and search בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1005><s%> was made in the house סִפְרַיָּ֗א <S%H5609><s%> of the rolls דִּ֧י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch גִנְזַיָּ֛א <S%H1596><s%> the treasures מְהַחֲתִ֥ין <S%H5182><s%> were laid up תַּמָּ֖ה <S%H8536><s%> where בְּבָבֶֽל׃ <S%H895><s%> in Babylon

וְהִשְׁתְּכַ֣ח <S%H7912><s%> And there was found בְּאַחְמְתָ֗א <S%H307><s%> at Achmetha בְּבִֽירְתָ֛א <S%H1001><s%> in the palace דִּ֛י <S%H1768><s%> which בְּמָדַ֥י <S%H4076><s%> of the Medes מְדִינְתָּ֖ה <S%H4083><s%> that [is] in the province מְגִלָּ֣ה <S%H4040><s%> roll חֲדָ֑ה <S%H2298><s%> a וְכֵן־ <S%H3652><s%> thus כְּתִ֥יב <S%H3790><s%> written בְּגַוַּ֖הּ <S%H1459><s%> and therein דִּכְרוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H1799><s%> [was] a record פ

בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8140><s%> year חֲדָ֜ה <S%H2298><s%> In the first לְכ֣וֹרֶשׁ <S%H3567><s%> of Cyrus מַלְכָּ֗א <S%H4430><s%> the king כּ֣וֹרֶשׁ <S%H3567><s%> [the same] Cyrus מַלְכָּא֮ <S%H4430><s%> the king שָׂ֣ם <S%H7761><s%> made טְעֵם֒ <S%H2942><s%> a decree בֵּית־ <S%H1005><s%> [concerning] the house אֱלָהָ֤א <S%H426><s%> of God בִֽירוּשְׁלֶם֙ <S%H3390><s%> at Jerusalem בַּיְתָ֣א <S%H1005><s%> Let the house יִתְבְּנֵ֔א <S%H1124><s%> be builded אֲתַר֙ <S%H870><s%> the place דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch דָבְחִ֣ין <S%H1684><s%> where they offered דִּבְחִ֔ין <S%H1685><s%> sacrifices וְאֻשּׁ֖וֹהִי <S%H787><s%> and let the foundations מְסֽוֹבְלִ֑ין <S%H5446><s%> thereof be strongly laid רוּמֵהּ֙ <S%H7314><s%> the height אַמִּ֣ין <S%H521><s%> cubits שִׁתִּ֔ין <S%H8361><s%> thereof threescore פְּתָיֵ֖הּ <S%H6613><s%> [and] the breadth אַמִּ֥ין <S%H521><s%> cubits שִׁתִּֽין׃ <S%H8361><s%> thereof threescore

נִדְבָּכִ֞ין <S%H5073><s%> rows דִּי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch אֶ֤בֶן <S%H69><s%> stones גְּלָל֙ <S%H1560><s%> of great תְּלָתָ֔א <S%H8532><s%> [With] three וְנִדְבָּ֖ךְ <S%H5073><s%> and a row דִּי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch אָ֣ע <S%H636><s%> timber חֲדַ֑ת <S%H2323><s%> of new וְנִ֨פְקְתָ֔א <S%H5313><s%> and let the expenses מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> out of בֵּ֥ית <S%H1005><s%> house מַלְכָּ֖א <S%H4430><s%> the king's תִּתְיְהִֽב׃ <S%H3052><s%> be given

וְ֠אַף <S%H638><s%> And also מָאנֵ֣י <S%H3984><s%> vessels בֵית־ <S%H1005><s%> of the house אֱלָהָא֮ <S%H426><s%> of God דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> which דַהֲבָ֣ה <S%H1722><s%> let the golden וְכַסְפָּא֒ <S%H3702><s%> and silver דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> which נְבֽוּכַדְנֶצַּ֗ר <S%H5020><s%> which Nebuchadnezzar הַנְפֵּ֛ק <S%H5312><s%> took forth מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> out of הֵיכְלָ֥א <S%H1965><s%> the temple דִי־ <S%H1768><s%> which בִירוּשְׁלֶ֖ם <S%H3390><s%> which [is] at Jerusalem וְהֵיבֵ֣ל <S%H2987><s%> and brought לְבָבֶ֑ל <S%H895><s%> unto Babylon יַהֲתִיב֗וּן <S%H8421><s%> be restored וִ֠יהָךְ <S%H1946><s%> and brought again לְהֵיכְלָ֤א <S%H1965><s%> unto the temple דִי־ <S%H1768><s%> which בִירֽוּשְׁלֶם֙ <S%H3390><s%> which [is] at Jerusalem לְאַתְרֵ֔הּ <S%H870><s%> [every one] to his place וְתַחֵ֖ת <S%H5182><s%> and place בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1005><s%> [them] in the house אֱלָהָֽא׃ <S%H426><s%> of God ס

כְּעַ֡ן <S%H3705><s%> Now תַּ֠תְּנַי <S%H8674><s%> Tattenai פַּחַ֨ת <S%H6347><s%> [therefore] Tatnai governor עֲבַֽר־ <S%H5675><s%> beyond נַהֲרָ֜ה <S%H5103><s%> the river שְׁתַ֤ר בּוֹזְנַי֙ <S%H8370><s%> Shetharboznai וּכְנָוָ֣תְה֔וֹן <S%H3675><s%> and your companions אֲפַרְסְכָיֵ֔א <S%H671><s%> the Apharsachites דִּ֖י <S%H1768><s%> of בַּעֲבַ֣ר <S%H5675><s%> which [are] beyond נַהֲרָ֑ה <S%H5103><s%> the river רַחִיקִ֥ין <S%H7352><s%> far הֲו֖וֹ <S%H1934><s%> be ye מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from תַּמָּֽה׃ <S%H8536><s%> thence

שְׁבֻ֕קוּ <S%H7662><s%> alone לַעֲבִידַ֖ת <S%H5673><s%> Let the work בֵּית־ <S%H1005><s%> house אֱלָהָ֣א <S%H426><s%> of God דֵ֑ךְ <S%H1791><s%> of this פַּחַ֤ת <S%H6347><s%> let the governor יְהוּדָיֵא֙ <S%H3062><s%> of the Jews וּלְשָׂבֵ֣י <S%H7868><s%> and the elders יְהוּדָיֵ֔א <S%H3062><s%> of the Jews בֵּית־ <S%H1005><s%> house אֱלָהָ֥א <S%H426><s%> of God דֵ֖ךְ <S%H1791><s%> this יִבְנ֥וֹן <S%H1124><s%> build עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> in אַתְרֵֽהּ׃ <S%H870><s%> his place

וּמִנִּי֮ <S%H4481><s%> Moreover I שִׂ֣ים <S%H7761><s%> make טְעֵם֒ <S%H2942><s%> a decree לְמָ֣א <S%H3964><s%> what דִֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> [even] of תַֽעַבְד֗וּן <S%H5648><s%> ye shall do עִם־ <S%H5974><s%> to שָׂבֵ֤י <S%H7868><s%> the elders יְהוּדָיֵא֙ <S%H3062><s%> Jews אִלֵּ֔ךְ <S%H479><s%> of these לְמִבְנֵ֖א <S%H1124><s%> for the building בֵּית־ <S%H1005><s%> house אֱלָהָ֣א <S%H426><s%> of God דֵ֑ךְ <S%H1791><s%> of this וּמִנִּכְסֵ֣י <S%H5232><s%> goods מַלְכָּ֗א <S%H4430><s%> that of the king's דִּ֚י <S%H1768><s%> out מִדַּת֙ <S%H4061><s%> the tribute עֲבַ֣ר <S%H5675><s%> beyond נַהֲרָ֔ה <S%H5103><s%> the river אָסְפַּ֗רְנָא <S%H629><s%> forthwith נִפְקְתָ֛א <S%H5313><s%> expenses תֶּהֱוֵ֧א <S%H1934><s%> be מִֽתְיַהֲבָ֛א <S%H3052><s%> given לְגֻבְרַיָּ֥א <S%H1400><s%> men אִלֵּ֖ךְ <S%H479><s%> unto these דִּי־ <S%H1768><s%> and that לָ֥א <S%H3809><s%> that they be not לְבַטָּלָֽא׃ <S%H989><s%> hindered

וּמָ֣ה <S%H4101><s%> And that which חַשְׁחָ֡ן <S%H2818><s%> they have need of וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1123><s%> both young תוֹרִ֣ין <S%H8450><s%> bullocks וְדִכְרִ֣ין <S%H1798><s%> and rams וְאִמְּרִ֣ין ׀ <S%H563><s%> and lambs לַעֲלָוָ֣ן ׀ <S%H5928><s%> for the burnt offerings לֶאֱלָ֪הּ <S%H426><s%> of the God שְׁמַיָּ֟א <S%H8065><s%> of heaven חִנְטִ֞ין <S%H2591><s%> wheat מְלַ֣ח ׀ <S%H4416><s%> salt חֲמַ֣ר <S%H2562><s%> wine וּמְשַׁ֗ח <S%H4887><s%> and oil כְּמֵאמַ֨ר <S%H3983><s%> according to the appointment כָּהֲנַיָּ֤א <S%H3549><s%> of the priests דִי־ <S%H1768><s%> in בִירֽוּשְׁלֶם֙ <S%H3390><s%> which [are] at Jerusalem לֶהֱוֵ֨א <S%H1934><s%> let it be מִתְיְהֵ֥ב <S%H3052><s%> given לְהֹ֛ם י֥וֹם ׀ <S%H3118><s%> them day בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3118><s%> by day דִּי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch לָ֥א <S%H3809><s%> without שָׁלֽוּ׃ <S%H7960><s%> fail

דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch לֶהֱוֹ֧ן <S%H1934><s%> they מְהַקְרְבִ֛ין <S%H7127><s%> may offer נִיחוֹחִ֖ין <S%H5208><s%> sacrifices of sweet savours לֶאֱלָ֣הּ <S%H426><s%> unto the God שְׁמַיָּ֑א <S%H8065><s%> of heaven וּמְצַלַּ֕יִן <S%H6739><s%> and pray לְחַיֵּ֥י <S%H2417><s%> for the life מַלְכָּ֖א <S%H4430><s%> of the king וּבְנֽוֹהִי׃ <S%H1123><s%> and of his sons

וּמִנִּי֮ <S%H4481><s%> Also שִׂ֣ים <S%H7761><s%> I have made טְעֵם֒ <S%H2942><s%> a decree דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> who כָל־ <S%H3606><s%> any אֱנָ֗שׁ <S%H606><s%> man דִּ֤י <S%H1768><s%> who יְהַשְׁנֵא֙ <S%H8133><s%> shall alter פִּתְגָמָ֣א <S%H6600><s%> word דְנָ֔ה <S%H1836><s%> this יִתְנְסַ֥ח <S%H5256><s%> be pulled down אָע֙ <S%H636><s%> let timber מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from בַּיְתֵ֔הּ <S%H1005><s%> his house וּזְקִ֖יף <S%H2211><s%> and being set up יִתְמְחֵ֣א <S%H4223><s%> let him be hanged עֲלֹ֑הִי <S%H5922><s%> thereon וּבַיְתֵ֛הּ <S%H1005><s%> and let his house נְוָל֥וּ <S%H5122><s%> a dunghill יִתְעֲבֵ֖ד <S%H5648><s%> be made עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> for דְּנָֽה׃ <S%H1836><s%> this

וֵֽאלָהָ֞א <S%H426><s%> And the God דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> who שַׁכִּ֧ן <S%H7932><s%> to dwell שְׁמֵ֣הּ <S%H8036><s%> that hath caused his name תַּמָּ֗ה <S%H8536><s%> there יְמַגַּ֞ר <S%H4049><s%> destroy כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> all מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4430><s%> kings וְעַם֙ <S%H5972><s%> and people דִּ֣י ׀ <S%H1768><s%> who יִשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7972><s%> that shall put יְדֵ֗הּ <S%H3028><s%> to their hand לְהַשְׁנָיָ֛ה <S%H8133><s%> to alter לְחַבָּלָ֛ה <S%H2255><s%> [and] to destroy בֵּית־ <S%H1005><s%> house אֱלָהָ֥א <S%H426><s%> of God דֵ֖ךְ <S%H1791><s%> this דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> who בִירוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <S%H3390><s%> which [is] at Jerusalem אֲנָ֤ה <S%H576><s%> I דָרְיָ֙וֶשׁ֙ <S%H1868><s%> Darius שָׂ֣מֶת <S%H7761><s%> have made טְעֵ֔ם <S%H2942><s%> a decree אָסְפַּ֖רְנָא <S%H629><s%> with speed יִתְעֲבִֽד׃ <S%H5648><s%> let it be done פ

אֱ֠דַיִן <S%H116><s%> Then תַּתְּנַ֞י <S%H8674><s%> Tattenai פַּחַ֧ת <S%H6347><s%> Tatnai governor עֲבַֽר־ <S%H5675><s%> on this side נַהֲרָ֛ה <S%H5103><s%> the river שְׁתַ֥ר בּוֹזְנַ֖י <S%H8370><s%> Shetharboznai וּכְנָוָתְה֑וֹן <S%H3675><s%> and their companions לָקֳבֵ֗ל <S%H6903><s%> according דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch שְׁלַ֞ח <S%H7972><s%> had sent דָּרְיָ֧וֶשׁ <S%H1868><s%> to that which Darius מַלְכָּ֛א <S%H4430><s%> the king כְּנֵ֖מָא <S%H3660><s%> so אָסְפַּ֥רְנָא <S%H629><s%> speedily עֲבַֽדוּ׃ <S%H5648><s%> they did

וְשָׂבֵ֤י <S%H7868><s%> And the elders יְהוּדָיֵא֙ <S%H3062><s%> of the Jews בָּנַ֣יִן <S%H1124><s%> builded וּמַצְלְחִ֔ין <S%H6744><s%> and they prospered בִּנְבוּאַת֙ <S%H5017><s%> through the prophesying חַגַּ֣י <S%H2292><s%> of Haggai [נְבִיאָה כ] (נְבִיָּ֔א <S%H5029><s%> prophet ק) וּזְכַרְיָ֖ה <S%H2148><s%> and Zechariah בַּר־ <S%H1247><s%> the son עִדּ֑וֹא <S%H5714><s%> of Iddo וּבְנ֣וֹ <S%H1124><s%> And they builded וְשַׁכְלִ֗לוּ <S%H3635><s%> and finished מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> [it] according טַ֙עַם֙ <S%H2941><s%> to the commandment אֱלָ֣הּ <S%H426><s%> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3479><s%> of Israel וּמִטְּעֵם֙ <S%H2942><s%> and according to the commandment כּ֣וֹרֶשׁ <S%H3567><s%> of Cyrus וְדָרְיָ֔וֶשׁ <S%H1868><s%> and Darius וְאַרְתַּחְשַׁ֖שְׂתְּא <S%H783><s%> and Artaxerxes מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4430><s%> king פָּרָֽס׃ <S%H6540><s%> of Persia
